table_description: Captures quote details including financial figures, dates, statuses, and associated project and company information.

table_columns.name: account_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the account associated with the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_city
table_columns.description: City part of the company's address in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_country
table_columns.description: Country part of the company's address in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_county
table_columns.description: County part of the company's address in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_full_address
table_columns.description: Full address of the company as captured in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_municipality
table_columns.description: Municipality of the company's address in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_street
table_columns.description: Street details of the company's address in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_zipcode
table_columns.description: Zip or postal code for the company's address in the quote.

table_columns.name: company_address_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the company address record associated with the quote.

table_columns.name: company_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the company to which the quote is issued.

table_columns.name: company_name
table_columns.description: Name of the company in the quote.

table_columns.name: confirmed_date
table_columns.description: Date and time when the quote was confirmed.

table_columns.name: created_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the quote record was created.

table_columns.name: currency
table_columns.description: Currency code for the quote amounts.

table_columns.name: currency_rate
table_columns.description: Exchange rate for the currency used in the quote.

table_columns.name: date
table_columns.description: The date when the quote was issued.

table_columns.name: deadline
table_columns.description: Deadline date and time for the quote's validity.

table_columns.name: deleted_date
table_columns.description: Date and time when the quote was marked as deleted, if applicable.

table_columns.name: description
table_columns.description: Description or additional details about the quote.

table_columns.name: discount
table_columns.description: Primary discount value applied to the quote.

table_columns.name: discount2
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: discount3
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: estimated_closing_date
table_columns.description: Estimated date when the quote may be closed or finalized.

table_columns.name: estimated_duration
table_columns.description: Estimated duration (in days or relevant unit) related to the quote's project.

table_columns.name: id
table_columns.description: Unique identifier for the quote.

table_columns.name: is_deleted
table_columns.description: Indicator if the quote has been deleted (e.g., 1 for deleted, 0 for active).

table_columns.name: is_role_based
table_columns.description: Indicates if the quote access or visibility is role based.

table_columns.name: is_sent
table_columns.description: Indicator if the quote has been sent (e.g., 1 for sent, 0 for not sent).

table_columns.name: local_price_list_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the local price list associated with the quote.

table_columns.name: modified_date
table_columns.description: Timestamp when the quote record was last modified.

table_columns.name: no
table_columns.description: Quote number or code.

table_columns.name: owner_email
table_columns.description: Email address of the quote owner.

table_columns.name: owner_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the quote owner.

table_columns.name: person_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the contact associated with the quote.

table_columns.name: person_name
table_columns.description: Name of the contact related to the quote.

table_columns.name: project_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the project linked to the quote.

table_columns.name: project_name
table_columns.description: Name of the project associated with the quote.

table_columns.name: quote_name
table_columns.description: Descriptive name or title for the quote.

table_columns.name: status
table_columns.description: Status code representing the current state of the quote.

table_columns.name: status_name
table_columns.description: Descriptive name of the quote status.

table_columns.name: sum
table_columns.description: Total sum or amount of the quote before taxes or discounts. This very important column  we can use this to calculate revenue for the company.

table_columns.name: vat_sum
table_columns.description: Total VAT amount applied to the quote.
